author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
title: Daily Fantasy Confronts a New Reality
description: DraftKings and FanDuel popularized daily-fantasy sports contests but are revamping to capture armchair quarterbacks who have grown wary of longshot odds and a regulatory crackdown on the young industry.

author: Betsy Mason
title: These Are the Most Valuable Roadless Areas Left on Earth
description: A new map reveals the extent to which roads have fragmented wild lands.

author: Craig Welch
title: Five Big Environmental Wins in 2016
description: Sure, it's been a tumultuous year for the planet. But here are some environmental achievements to celebrate: renewable energy, protected oceans, and deconstructed dams.

title: Parts of Corpus Christi cleared to use tap water again
description: CORPUS CHRISTI, Texas (AP) — Officials told residents in outlying parts of Corpus Christi that they could resume using tap water, and an asphalt company blamed for contaminating the supply pledged to help Texas environmental…

author: Sabine Spindler
title: Moderne und zeitgenössische Kunst: Die neue Lust an der deutschen Malerei
description: Eine sehr solide Bilanz zieht Robert Ketterer für seine Auktionen mit zeitgenössischer Kunst. Die Spitze besetzen Papierarbeiten von Sam Francis und Helen Frankenthaler. Angezogen haben die Konkrete Kunst und frühe Farbfeldmalerei. Weiterhin starke Preise notieren Werke von Gotthard Graubner während Arbeiten von Imi Knoebel erstmals sechsstellig notieren. Abstriche verzeichnet die Klassische Moderne. Sie hat ihre Höhepunkte bei Emil Nolde und Max Pechstein.

author: Jon Kamp
title: Dylann Roof Found Guilty of All Charges in Church-Shooting Trial
description: A jury found Dylann Roof guilty of all charges in the racially motivated killing of nine black church worshipers in Charleston, S.C., last year.

author: KRISTEN GELINEAU
title: Aboriginal woman's slaying exposes Australia's racial divide
description: YAMBA, Australia (AP) — The life was long drained from Lynette Daley by the time the cops rolled up to the lonely beach where her naked body lay. Her skin was cold, her lips were blue, and her blood was everywhere. It…

title: IT WOULD BE 'A FIRE SALE': Reporter says Trump will not sell his businesses before taking office

title: Republican National Committee Security Foiled Russian Hackers

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Dollar Surges as U.S. Prepares for Higher Rates
description: The U.S. dollar surged to its highest level in 14 years Thursday after the U.S. Federal Reserve signaled it expects to raise interest-rates quicker than previously anticipated.

title: Facebook Inches Closer to Fact-Checking Its News

title: The two-hour 'moonshot marathon' — a physical feat long thought impossible — could finally happen in 2017

author: Sabine Spindler
title: Moderne und zeitgenössische Kunst: Die neue Lust an der deutschen Malerei
description: Eine sehr solide Bilanz zieht Robert Ketterer für seine Auktionen mit zeitgenössischer Kunst. Die Spitze besetzen Papierarbeiten von Sam Francis und Helen Frankenthaler. Angezogen haben die Konkrete Kunst und frühe Farbfeldmalerei. Weiterhin starke Preise notieren Werke von Gotthard Graubner während Arbeiten von Imi Knoebel erstmals sechsstellig notieren. Abstriche verzeichnet die Klassische Moderne. Sie hat ihre Höhepunkte bei Emil Nolde und Max Pechstein.
